panels.description: Article-Sender-IDs are **NOT** the same on every instance. Run "Ticket::Article::Sender.find(<value>).name"  within your rails console to get the renames (see transforms) correctly.

panels.description: Article-Type-IDs are **NOT** the same on every instance. Run "Ticket::Article::Type.find(<value>)"  within your rails console to get the renames (see transforms) correctly.
panels.title: Article type ratio
